Class oracle.plsql.PBoolean 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.plsql.PValue
           |
           +----oracle.plsql.PBoolean
public class PBoolean
extends PValue
This class encapsulates PL/SQL booleans.
See Also:
Boolean

PBoolean()
Constructs a null PL/SQL boolean.
PBoolean(boolean)
Constructs a PL/SQL boolean.

booleanValue()
Returns the value of this PBoolean as a boolean.
copy(PBoolean)
Copies the PBoolean.
setValue(boolean)
Sets the value of this PBoolean.
toString()
Returns the String representation of this PBoolean.

PBoolean 
  public PBoolean()
Constructs a null PL/SQL boolean.
Parameters:
value - Java null value
PBoolean 
  public PBoolean(boolean value)
Constructs a PL/SQL boolean.
Parameters:
value - the initial value of the PBoolean

booleanValue 
  public boolean booleanValue()
Returns the value of this PBoolean as a boolean. You should use isNull() to determine if this value is NULL before getting the boolean value.
Throws: NullValueException
If the value is NULL.
See Also:
isNull
setValue 
  public void setValue(boolean value)
Sets the value of this PBoolean. To set this PBoolean to null, use setNull().
Parameters:
value - the boolean value to set
See Also:
setNull
copy 
  public void copy(PBoolean value)
Copies the PBoolean.
Parameters:
value - the PValue to copy from
toString 
  public String toString()
Returns the String representation of this PBoolean.
